docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
Alpha Software!

This is pre-release Alpha software, based on another code base and the needed changes to make a final release version are not yet completed. Everything is subject to change; and documentation needs to be written.

poetry install xdynamo

or

pip install xdynamo

docs.title: Bug Fixes
docs.text:
• allow class structural issue exception to propagate up. (eb3c174)
  • type-hint UUID for get_via_id (it always worked, but now type-hint is correct). (44979d1)

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• conditional updates/deletes + updating if removal + table scanning support (38c1e8c)
  • update dependencies to get latest xmodel. (34b24f5)

docs.title: Features
docs.text: • can use any future version of xmodel up until <1.0.0. (2cd1508)

docs.title: Features
docs.text: • add Self + dataclass transform features from Python 3.11 (but still works with < 3.11) (c7d3b68)

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• finish rest of xmodel-dynamo to just xdynamo rename. (6de99ab)
  • make xcon optional dependency. (85cd8e4)
  • only auto-create tables if in unittest or local environments. (e42a0f6)
  • rename/simplify library name to xdynamo (file chages). (f3d6590)
  • rename/simplify library to xdynamo. (247f5fc)
  • upgrade moto + adapt to it. (f898db6)

docs.title: Bug Fixes
docs.text:
• specify default region for unit tests. (4c4b9d5)
  • updated xmodel, it had a bug. (bd3cff1)
